## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the README (if needed)
- [ ] I have updated the API documentation (if needed)
- [ ] I have added JSDoc comments to new functions
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md

### Security
- [ ] My changes don't introduce security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have not exposed any sensitive information
- [ ] I have properly validated all user inputs
- [ ] I have added appropriate error handling

### Database (if applicable)
- [ ] I have created/updated Prisma migrations
- [ ] I have tested the migration rollback
- [ ] I have updated database documentation

### API Changes (if applicable)
- [ ] I have maintained backward compatibility OR documented breaking changes
- [ ] I have updated API documentation
- [ ] I have added/updated validation schemas
- [ ] I have tested all affected endpoints

### Performance
- [ ] My changes don't negatively impact performance
- [ ] I have considered scalability
- [ ] I have optimized database queries (if applicable)
